mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.nick_name AS nickName, d.dept_id AS deptId FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_project_dept pd ON pd.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN ss_f_projects p ON p.id = pd.project_id WHERE p.parentid = #{projectId}
